about_the_game:
The Hbis-tt is a sliding wall box wagon that is a conversion of the Hbills wagons, featuring large sliding doors and a spacious interior, the wagons are for transporting light car parts. At their peak over 600 examples were in service, and they have been running on the Deutsche Bahn network since the late 1990s.

In Train Simulator, virtualRailroads’ Hbis-tt Wagon Pack 01 includes an authentic recreation of the wagon and features the RandomSkin system to deliver a realistic unsorted appearance of different logos on consists of wagons.

Key Features


  • Hbis-tt wagon in DB red
  • RandomSkin system offering a variety of different DB logos; blank, Railion, DB, DB Schenker and DB Cargo
  • Automatic tailgates and dynamic numbers
  • Download size: 24.5 MB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 40 GB HD space
  • Sound: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics: Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional: Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
